interface.description: Devices containing an array of analog inputs.

field.name: Analog Input %1%
field.description: Momentary input value for input number %1%.

field.name: Analog Input %1%, Raw
field.description: Momentary raw binary input value for input number %1%.

field.name: Analog Input %1%, Bits
field.description: Number of bits of precision of input value for input number %1%.

field.name: Analog Input %1%, Range, Low
field.description: Lowest possible value for input number %1%.

field.name: Analog Input %1%, Range, High
field.description: Highest possible value for input number %1%.

field.name: Analog Input Count
field.description: Number of analog inputs available on the device.

sensorData.comment:
The input values must be reported using the correct precision and unit. Examples of units that could be used:
* `%` - for instance 0-100 % * `mA` - for instance 4-20 mA * `V` - for instance 0-10 V
